sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_nnemc0_labor_categories"> <x_snc_nnemc0_labor_categories action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <category_level display_value="Junior Level">fe320462db9d23008e9357935e96190f</category_level> <category_name>Deployed Support Specialist</category_name> <education_level display_value="High school Diploma or General Equivalency Diploma (GED)">9972c462db9d23008e9357935e9619b1</education_level> <minimum_experience>Under immediate supervision, provide network technical advice and assistance during the planning phase of a deployment/exercise and coordinate swift solutions to networking problems during the execution phase. Provide direct computer/network support to include router, firewall, IDS/IPS, DNS, AD/Exchange, configuration, installation, maintenance and troubleshooting to USMC deployed units as required. Assist in the development and execution of IA training for deployed units. Travel in support of an exercise or workup possible. Additional focus would be to provide direct support to the D-30 process. Support identified operational requirements for the intended operational environment; assist with identifying required HW and SW; submit personnel foreign country clearance requests and obtain necessary visas; document the result of the deployment in a Government provided template with input and conduct a post-deployment review with the Government; return any unused and reusable equipment to stock; coordinate the transportation of all HW and SW required to support contingency operations and obtain all import permits. 2-4 years of experience providing deployed support. Microsoft or Cisco certification preferred.</minimum_experience> <number>LABCAT0001092</number> <parent_category/> <sys_class_name>x_snc_nnemc0_labor_categories</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>jnyika</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-10-24 16:40:28</sys_created_on> <sys_id>7bc48426db9d23008e9357935e9619de</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>jnyika</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-10-24 16:44:46</sys_updated_on> </x_snc_nnemc0_labor_categories> </record_update>
